settings.title: Join the Hotel Collection Distributor Program
settings.subtitle: Get 50% off our selection of hotel-inspired products when you become a Hotel Collection Distributor.

settings.title: Take Your Business To The Next Level
settings.text: Apply today to partner with one of the industry's fastest-growing lifestyle brands. Speak to a Hotel Collection Business Consultant to learn more.

settings.heading: Double Your Investment
settings.subheading:
As a Hotel Collection distributor, you will have the opportunity to double your investment by leveraging the products of a world-renowned lifestyle brand that is beloved by celebrities
and retailers alike.

settings.heading: Improve Your Customer Retention
settings.subheading:
By offering your customers products that allow them to transform their homes into the destination of their dreams, you can improve customer retention while increasing your revenue
and sell-through rates.

settings.heading: Exclusive Wholesale Prices
settings.subheading: Joining our distribution network will enable you to get exclusive wholesale prices and opportunities to expand your business.

settings.title: Become a Hotel Collection Distributor and discover endless possibilities.
settings.subtitle: Elevate your storefront or e-commerce site with our curated line of luxury products.
settings.review_content:
“My clients love Hotel Collection! Since incorporating the products in my showroom,
I’ve seen a huge increase in sales and retention.”

settings.question: Interested in becoming a wholesaler or retailer with us?
settings.answer:
We welcome you to apply to our wholesale program. Prior to applying to our program, please note that there is a $1,000 order minimum. An order value below that amount will not qualify for checkout.

If you are interested in purchasing diffusers and oils, the order minimum is $5,000 and requires a Scent Consultant appointment in order to make a purchase.

Please submit a request to speak with a Scent Consultant.

settings.question: What features do Hotel Collection Diffusers have?
settings.answer:
All Hotel Collection Scent Diffusers offer customizable fragrance intensity and automatically turn off when the timer is up or oil runs out.

Our two larger models, the Penthouse Scent
Diffuser and Villa Scent Diffuser, boast a built-in
fan for consistent coverage, security lock for the fragrance compartment, and programmable weekly timer that allows up to five unique operating periods. The Villa Scent Diffuser is our hybrid unit; it can operate as a stand-alone diffuser, or be connected
to the HVAC for whole-home scenting.

settings.question: What are Hotel Collection Candles made from?
settings.answer: All of our candles are curated using a soy-blend wax and are 100% non-toxic, vegan, and cruelty-free. Each candle is hand-poured in our Miami warehouse with the finest oil concentrations and 100% lead-free cotton wicks.

settings.question: What is a Hotel Collection fragrance oil?
settings.answer:
Hotel Collection fragrance oils are made from a blend of therapeutic-grade essential oils and perfume-quality fragrance oils, designed to mimic the notes
of your favorite hotel scents. They are designed to maintain all the therapeutic benefits of essential oils and provide maximum versatility and control of
the scenting environment

settings.text: Elevate your business and stand alongside our ever-growing list of distributors.
